籤詩版本二:
Ukugijima ukuze unqobe izingozi eziningi, ukuthwala amanzi nokudonsa abantu ukukhuphuka izintaba
Ngize ngibheke kwelinye izwe ukuze ngithole usizo, angikaze ngibuye ngemva kokuhamba izinkulungwane zamakhilomitha.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana nokuhudula udaka namanzi.
Kuhle ukucophelela kukho konke.
解曰: Ukuhlehla kungenzeka. Intuthuko inzima. Vele ubambe ongezansi. Ungalindeli ukukhuphukela phezulu.
籤詩故事一:
◇Kunzima ku-Qiuniang ukuhamba
U-Du Qiu wayengowokuzalwa eJinling oBukhosini baseTang.
Lapho eneminyaka engu-15, waba isancinza sika-Li Qi (imbuka eNkathini YaseTang).
Ngonyaka wesibili kaYuanhe (807), uLi Qi wethula ngokusemthethweni ibutho elizovukela. Kamuva, ukuhlubuka kuka-Li Qi kwabhuntsha futhi uDu Qiu wafakwa esigodlweni. Kamuva, wathandwa uMbusi uXianzong waseTang Dynasty futhi waba isancinza.
Ngonyaka weshumi nanhlanu kaYuanhe (820), uTang Muzong wangena esihlalweni sobukhosi futhi wammisa njengendodana yakhe u-Li Min's Fumu (umzanyana owayesebenza ngokukhethekile ekunakekeleni izingane zomndeni wasebukhosini).
Kamuva, uLi Min wehliswa esikhundleni njengeNkosi yaseZhang, futhi uDu Qiuci wabuyela edolobheni lakubo.
Lapho uDu Mu edlula ngaseJinling, wambona empofu futhi emdala...
(Le ndaba isingathekiso sokuzisola ngokuthi izinto ziba zimbi njalo.)
聖意: Umuzi awuziphathi kahle, uthandazela ingcebo, inhlanhla ekwindla nobusika, umshado oshelelayo, uthandazela izibusiso uLiujia, uthandazela izibusiso kwabahamba ngezinyawo, uvimbe amasimu, izikelemu, awuvuni imfuyo eyisithupha, kunzima ukuthola abantu, amacala, ukulahlekelwa inhlanhla yokufuduka, impahla elahlekile, ukugula, namathuna eFushan.
